column1:
At  the  conclusion  of the  trial,  the  learned  Trial Judge 
acquitted  all

the accused from  1 stand  2 nd  charges 
framed 
against 
them and convicted
the  1 stand  2nd  appellants  for  the  3 rd  Charge  for  lesser  offence  of  culpable
homicide not amounting to murder causing death of Abdul Majeed under Sec.

297  of Penal  Code  read  with  sec.32 
of Penal  Code  and  sentenced  them  to

undergo  8  years  R.I.  and  with 
the 
fine  of  Rs.10,000.00  each  entailing  a
